mapper.select: select * from mk_course mkc inner join mk_difficulty mkd on mkc.mkdfid =mkd.mkdfid left join mk_fathercourse_section mkfs on mkc.mkcsid=mkfs.mkcourseid right join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkfs.mkfcsid =mkss.mkfcsid and mkfs.mkcourseid=mkss.mkcsid right join mk_process mkpr on mkss.mkcstid=mkpr.mkcstid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1} and mkpr.mkuid=#{param2} order by mkpr.mkprid desc limit 1

select * from mk_course mkc inner join mk_difficulty mkd on mkc.mkdfid =mkd.mkdfid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkc.mkcsid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_process mkpr on mkpr.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1}

with c as ( select mkco.mkcmid,mkss.mkcsid,mkus.mkuimg,mkus.mkuname,mkco.mkcmcontent,mkss.mkcsname,mkco.mkcmcreatetime from mk_comment mkco inner join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkco.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid inner join mk_use mkus on mkco.mkuid=mkus.mkuid where mkcsid = #{param1} group by mkco.mkcmid
) select count(c.mkcmid) fabulous,c.* from c inner join mk_fabulous f on c.mkcmid=f.mkcmid group by c.mkcmid order by c.mkcmcreatetime desc

select mkcm.mkcmid,mkus.mkuname,mkus.mkuimg,mkss.mkcsid,mkcm.mkcmcreatetime,mkcm.mkcmcontent,mkss.mkcsname, count(mkf.mkcmid) count,mkss.mkcstid from mk_comment mkcm inner join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkcm.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid inner join mk_fabulous mkf on mkcm.mkcmid=mkf.mkcmid inner join mk_use mkus on mkf.mkuid=mkus.mkuid where mkss.mkcstid=#{param1} group by mkcm.mkuid

select mkas.mkatpid,mkas.mkuid,mku.mkuname,mku.mkuimg,mkas.mkatitle,mkas.mkatpcontent,mkas.mkatptime,mkas.mkapreview,mkss.mkcsname,mkss.mkcsurl,mkss.mkcstid,count(mkas.mkatpid) count from mk_asktopic mkas left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkas.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_answertopic mkan on mkas.mkatpid=mkan.mkatpid left join mk_use mku on mkas.mkuid=mku.mkuid where mkss.mkcsid=#{param1} group by mkas.mkatpid

select mkc.mkcsid,mkc.mkctitle,mkc.mkclearned,mkdf.mkdfname,mkc.mkcmoney,mkc.mkcimg from mk_course mkc inner join mk_difficulty mkdf on mkc.mkdfid=mkdf.mkdfid where mkcid=#{param1} order by mkclearned desc limit 1,3

with a as(select mku.mkuid,mku.mkuimg,mku.mkuname,mkn.mknid, mkn.mknotecontent,mkn.mknctime,mkn.mknlink, mkc.mkcsid,count(mkf.mknid) count from mk_note mkn inner join mk_use mku on mkn.mkuid=mku.mkuid left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid left join mk_Fabulous mkf on mkn.mknid=mkf.mknid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1} group by mkn.mknid order by mkn.mknctime desc limit 0,1) select *from a

select mku.mkuid,mku.mkuimg,mku.mkuname,mkn.mknid, mkn.mknotecontent,mkn.mknctime,mkn.mknlink, mkc.mkcsid,count(mkf.mknid) count from mk_note mkn inner join mk_use mku on mkn.mkuid=mku.mkuid inner join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid inner join mk_course mkc on mkss.mkcsid=mkc.mkcsid inner join mk_Fabulous mkf on mkn.mknid=mkf.mknid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1} group by mkn.mknid

select mkas.mkatpid,mkas.mkuid,mku.mkuname,mku.mkuimg,mkas.mkatitle,mkas.mkatpcontent,mkas.mkatptime,mkas.mkapreview,mkss.mkcsname,mkss.mkcsurl,mkss.mkcstid,count(mkas.mkatpid) count,mkua.mkuname as uname,mkan.mkuid as uid from mk_asktopic mkas left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mkas.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_answertopic mkan on mkas.mkatpid=mkan.mkatpid left join mk_use mku on mkas.mkuid=mku.mkuid left join mk_use mkua on mkan.mkuid=mkua.mkuid where mkss.mkcstid=#{param1} group by mkas.mkatpid
